name: MotherUnknown's VeggieGrounds
description:
Description

You are a small boy who has a major decision to make - eat veggies or fight them! This is a game for Slavic Game Jam 2018 #sgj2018

Credits
  • Wiktoria Fruba  - Graphics
  • Mikołaj Dereszewski - Programming
  • Hubert Mielnik - Programming

*Please remember that the game is still under development, and it may contain bugs, be unbalanced or still lacking content*
